item.title: foaas.sh - Command Line Fuck Off as a Service client
item.description: foaas.sh is a command line [Fuck Off as a Service client](http://foaas.com/). It is written is bash and supports multiple forms of API interaction. It also supports `xclip`, when available, the result of an interaction is copied to the clipboard for later use.
